summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your ASP.NET Core Blazor application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the File Attachments Module to your application.
Adds the File Attachments Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
Options that you can use to configure the File Attachments Module.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.

summary.para: Contains classes specific to the File Attachments Module ASP.NET Core Blazor functionality.
Contains options that you can use to configure the File Attachments Module.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.FileAttachments.Blazor.FileAttachmentsOptions.DefaultMaxFileSize
member.value: The maximum file size in bytes. The default value is 4MB.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.FileAttachments.Blazor.FileAttachmentsOptions.ExportedTypes

summary.para: Returns the list of Module-specific types exported to the Application Model.

member.value: The list of Module-specific types exported to the Application Model.
